casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Malon Kysheef GRIFFIN 147P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for Griffin, Malon Kysheef. Carole Biggers, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2019 by State of NC to Deem Response to Petition for Discretionary Review Timely Filed:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
